name: Baked
description:
Baked

"I'll do anything..." A father chasing the path his wife and daughters took before him.

"I'm surprised these still work." Explore a red devastated landscape that rains ash. The Sun did not care.

"No!..." Avoid the Sun's Ultra's, search and destroy extraterrestrials.

With new ships available to escape the sun's torment, a father makes his way through dangerous territory. Having already sent his wife and daughters on the first ships, he is alone and desperate. If he can find all 5 control panels and open the gate to safety, he may just be able to rejoin them.
